QuestData.Title: The Pools of Youth
QuestData.Description: North! Go north to the Pools of Youth. Get some of the water but be on your guard.$b$bThe mogu list this as a "high value" target. Kang Bramblestaff will meet you there if he has not already arrived by your side.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A sense of urgency fills you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain some of the Water of Youth.
QuestData.CompletionText: Nothing like being mortal to give one a sense of urgency.
QuestData.RewardText: You... you found the pools! The waters do exist!$b$bSomething is wrong though. I feel equal parts shadow and light swirling in this vial.
